title: Ep 239: Sex Toys & Scalp Massages
itunes:title: Ep 239: Sex Toys & Scalp Massages
description:
This week’s episode the ladies are solo in the studio to talk about what makes things SO BAD on first dates, in the bedroom and in relationships. They begin with discussing the shift in sex toy aesthetics and why many major sex toy companies are changing the way we view sex toys. We re-introduce heaux fax this week to discuss the average thrusts a man needs to reach ejaculation. This week’s Sex tip involves scalp massages and HoeMail the ladies give phone sex tips for a Prison Bae.
